title: The Big Salesman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: *Choose any item (Even those that arent from the guild) to auction off in the announcement channel. After it is sold the guild gains Profit equal to the auctioned off profit. If an item is not sold off, the guild may use it themselves.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
*Daily Profit will happen even if a guild member is hanged, as long as this role is alive
*Non guild players will gain 2 profit every day
*Your presence will be announced at the start of the game
*Alternate wincon possibility avaleable if this role is in the game

fields.name: Item:
fields.value:
An actual shop
Cost 10
Uses Unlimited
Open Up: Will be used with The Big Salesman's ability. You may choose 3 items to auction off
Tryouts: If not used by The Big Salesman this ability will be used. You may choose 3 people and give them an item of choice, this can be any item. The guild gains 3 profit for every item, caused by this, used

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
Alternative Goal: Eliminate half of the players and hire everyone else into the guild (8 profit per player)
